overview: Hassan, a young man from Tanta, loves Basima, the neighbor’s daughter, and is alone with her in a moment of weakness, as a result of which she loses her virginity, but he reassures her that he will return from Cairo to marry her, not knowing that Basima is pregnant. Hassan goes to Cairo, and his wallet is stolen, but the thief gets hit by a car and dies. Everyone thinks that Hassan lost his life, and Basmaya gets into trouble.
title: ورد وشوك
